data.name: MXGP2 - The Official Motocross Videogame Demo
data.detailed_description: Download MXGP2 DEMO and prepare to experience Motocross' true heart. Official licenses, real bikes, rosters and tracks! Try the Nakhonchaisri and Locket circuits, but remember to customise your pilot and your bike before. These are just some of the new things you'll find in the complete game.
data.about_the_game: Download MXGP2 DEMO and prepare to experience Motocross' true heart. Official licenses, real bikes, rosters and tracks! Try the Nakhonchaisri and Locket circuits, but remember to customise your pilot and your bike before. These are just some of the new things you'll find in the complete game.
data.short_description: Download MXGP2 DEMO and prepare to experience Motocross' true heart. Official licenses, real bikes, rosters and tracks!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows®Vista SP2 / Windows® 7 SP1 / Windows® 8 / Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500K 3.3GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 850
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640 / Radeon HD 6670 1GB*
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: *Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are not officially supported.
